pkgmetadata.longdescription: Methods for Robust Rank Aggregation // Methods for aggregating ranked lists, especially lists of genes. It implements the Robust Rank Aggregation Kolde et al (2012) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btr709 and some other simple algorithms for the task. RRA method uses a probabilistic model for aggregation that is robust to noise and also facilitates the calculation of significance probabilities for all the elements in the final ranking.
